title: Sell Hanyu Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Hanyu Whisky | Card Series & Ichiro's Malt | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Hanyu whisky. We buy the Ichiro's Malt Card Series and other rare Hanyu releases from this closed distillery.
heroSubhead: Buying the Card Series and rare Hanyu single casks.
introParagraph: Hanyu, the closed distillery behind the legendary 'Card Series', is a cornerstone of Japanese whisky collecting. We purchase verified Hanyu bottles.
whatWeBuy: Ichiro's Malt Card Series (Ace of Spades, Joker, etc.)
photoChecklist: Front label identifying the 'Card' or Release
Back label with Cask # and Bottle #
conditionFactors: Label condition: Card Series labels are iconic; damage hurts value.
Authenticity: Hanyu is a target for fakes. We verify carefully.
pricingFactors: The Card: 'Poker Hands' (Royal Flush) are worth more than random cards. 'Joker' is the peak.
Series Completeness: If you have a full suit, let us know.
Rarity: Total outturn of the cask.

faqs.question: What is the Card Series?
faqs.answer: A series of 54 bottles (deck of cards + jokers) released by Ichiro Akuto using Hanyu stock. A full set sold for nearly $1M.

faqs.question: Do you buy single Cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. We buy individual Clubs, Hearts, Spades, and Diamonds.

faqs.question: What is 'Nice Butt'?
faqs.answer: A pun on the 'Butt' cask size. It's a collectible Hanyu release.

faqs.question: Do you buy Golden Horse?
faqs.answer: Only if it is vintage era Hanyu stock, not the modern supermarket blend.

faqs.question: How do you pay for high value items?
Is Hanyu better than Karuizawa?
faqs.answer: Different. Karuizawa is sherry-heavy/peaty. Hanyu is often wood-driven and complex.
